statements: SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM assistance_programs;
SELECT * FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_name = 'Food Assistance';
SELECT program_name, eligibility_criteria FROM assistance_programs WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, beneficiaries FROM assistance_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM assistance_programs WHERE beneficiaries @> ARRAY['John Doe'];
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM assistance_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT program_name, eligibility_criteria FROM assistance_programs WHERE beneficiaries @> ARRAY['John', 'Jane'] ORDER BY start_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, COUNT(*) AS total_beneficiaries FROM assistance_programs GROUP BY program_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_beneficiaries DESC;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, beneficiaries FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_name ILIKE '%food%' AND start_date < '2022-09-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_id, program_name, ARRAY_LENGTH(beneficiaries, 1) AS num_beneficiaries FROM assistance_programs ORDER BY num_beneficiaries DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM eligibility_criteria;
SELECT program_id, age_requirement, income_requirement FROM eligibility_criteria;
SELECT beneficiary_name, address, program_id FROM beneficiaries;
SELECT beneficiary_id, beneficiary_name, program_id FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries ORDER BY beneficiary_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE age_requirement > 18;
SELECT beneficiary_name, address FROM beneficiaries ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 101 AND beneficiary_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT program_id, COUNT(beneficiary_id) as total_beneficiaries FROM beneficiaries GROUP BY program_id HAVING total_beneficiaries > 5;
SELECT program_id, AVG(income_requirement) as avg_income_requirement FROM eligibility_criteria;
SELECT * FROM programs;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM beneficiaries WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE required_income > 50000;
SELECT program_name, full_name, date_of_birth FROM programs p INNER JOIN beneficiaries b ON p.program_id = b.program_id;
SELECT * FROM eligibility_criteria ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT full_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM beneficiaries WHERE gender='Male' ORDER BY beneficiary_id ASC;
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs WHERE LENGTH(program_name) > 10;
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%education%';
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(description) < 50 ORDER BY program_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM eligibility_criteria;
SELECT program_id, age_criteria FROM eligibility_criteria WHERE has_dependents = TRUE;
SELECT program_id, program_name, description FROM programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT name, address, contact_number FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT beneficiary_id, program_id FROM program_beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT name, address, contact_number FROM beneficiaries WHERE program_id = 2;
SELECT program_name, description FROM programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT beneficiary_id, program_id FROM program_beneficiaries WHERE beneficiary_id = 100 AND program_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM assistance_programs;
SELECT program_name, eligibility_criteria FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name FROM assistance_programs WHERE eligibility_criteria LIKE '%income%';
SELECT beneficiary_name, address FROM beneficiaries ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT program_id, total_beneficiaries, success_rate FROM program_statistics WHERE success_rate > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM beneficiaries WHERE age > 30;
SELECT program_name, eligibility_criteria FROM assistance_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT beneficiary_name, address FROM beneficiaries WHERE beneficiary_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM program_statistics WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name, income_range, eligibility_status FROM assistance_programs JOIN program_eligibility ON assistance_programs.program_id = program_eligibility.program_id;
